title: Oxygen vacancies on CuGa2 catalysts enhance CO2 reduction to CO
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01026D, Paper
Jiangfeng Mou, Jin Hu, Tianyou Chen, Kaizhao Wang, Kaijun Wang, WeiJun Zhang, Shuai Wu, Jin Shi, Pengchong Zhao
This study adopts a very simple and effective method to prepare the Oâ€“CuGa2 catalyst electrode enriched with oxygen vacancies. Its Faraday efficiency for CO production reaches as high as 82.6%.
